item.title: Report X-2024081939
item.description:
Report X-2024081939

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-20
  • City: HARTFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED OF A FLAMMABLE LIQUID HAZMAT THAT WAS LEAKING ON AN INCOMPATIBLE PACKAGE SLIDE. NO OTHER PACKAGES WERE PRESENT. RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED TAHT PACKAGE BEGAN TO LEAK AFTER BEING PLACED ON INCOMPATIBLE SLIDE. PACKAGE REMAINED CONTAINED AND LEAKED LIQUIDS WERE ABSORBED AND ISOLATED INTO A LINED SPILL TRAY. PACKAGE WAS ALSO CONTAINED IN A LINED SPILL TRAY.

item.title: Report X-2024081521
item.description:
Report X-2024081521

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-12
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024081521 The box has no markings on it. The box contains a N232404980 Drivers front airbag. The barcode is using a hazmat service code that is flagging the package to have HAP done on it. No hazmat certification or OP-900. Unable to pass HAP and not origin station. This is an undeclared hazmat. 2. X-2024081522 This is an undeclared hazmat. The box has no markings on it. The box contains an N232404980 Driver Front Airbag Inflator. The barcode is using a hazmat service code and is asking for HAP to be done. No hazmat certification or OP-900. Unable to pass HAP. Not origin station. 3. X-2024081523 This is an undeclared hazmat. The box has no markings on it. The box contains an N232404980 Driver Front Airbag Inflator. The barcode is using a hazmat service code and is asking for HAP to be done. No hazmat certification or OP-900. Unable to pass HAP. Not origin station.

item.title: Report X-2024081744
item.description:
Report X-2024081744

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-28T15:13:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-24
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package is a case of two 1-gallon bottles industrial degreaser. Fully Regulated Corrosive Haz item. Bottles have loose caps, leaked. Caps not secured with tape or by other means. Liquids not bagged to prevent release. Relatively tall box unlikely to remain upright during sortation and transport.

item.title: Report X-2024081720
item.description:
Report X-2024081720

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-28T15:13:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-23
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Scan images show bottom of pkg was wet during sortation. Pkg was forwarded to QA for repacking. Barcode label indicates shipment is "Ltd Qty" but no diamonds can be seen anywhere on outer packaging in scan images. Damaged/leaking bottle and original outer carton not present - whereabouts unknown. It is presumed the cap was loose on the missing bottle, the contents were repacked before "Ltd Qty" printed on barcode label was discovered.
